statements: SELECT * FROM wealth_management_clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE risk_tolerance='High';
SELECT * FROM wealth_management_clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, investment_goals FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE client_id=3;
SELECT client_id, client_name, risk_tolerance FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE risk_tolerance='Low' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, risk_tolerance, investment_goals FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Low' ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' OR client_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, investment_goals FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND risk_tolerance = 'Medium';
SELECT DISTINCT risk_tolerance FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE investment_goals LIKE '%retirement%' ORDER BY risk_tolerance DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_goals FROM wealth_management_clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' AND client_name <> 'Alice' ORDER BY investment_goals ASC, client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'low';
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_goals FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, risk_tolerance, investment_goals FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT account_id, client_id, account_type, account_balance FROM account_details WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high';
SELECT * FROM account_details ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT client_id, account_balance FROM account_details WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND account_balance > 1000;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_goals FROM clients WHERE investment_goals LIKE '%retirement%';
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients WHERE risk_tolerance='high';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, transaction_type, amount FROM clients c JOIN accounts a ON c.client_id=a.client_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id=t.account_id WHERE c.risk_tolerance='low';
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT client_name, account_type, balance FROM clients JOIN accounts ON clients.client_id = accounts.client_id
SELECT client_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM clients JOIN accounts ON clients.client_id = accounts.client_id GROUP BY client_name
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email FROM clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT account_id, balance, creation_date FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT option_id, option_name, risk_level, potential_return FROM investment_options WHERE risk_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY potential_return DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email FROM clients WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT option_id, option_name, risk_level FROM investment_options WHERE potential_return > 0 ORDER BY potential_return DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000;
SELECT client_name, investment_name FROM clients c JOIN investments i ON c.client_id = i.client_id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM clients
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM clients WHERE client_age > 30
SELECT client_name, risk_tolerance FROM clients ORDER BY risk_tolerance DESC
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0
